properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret key used for signing jwt authentication tokens

properties.name: frontend.RecoveryPage
properties.description: A variable storing the URL of the password recovery page. This URL is included in the recovery email and allows users to reset their passwords

properties.name: jwt.durationOfValidity
properties.description: Long, millis, a variable representing the duration, in milliseconds, for which JWT tokens remain valid
